genre_description: Near-future social drama focusing on AI integration in daily life, medical ethics, and bureaucratic struggle.

ai_characters.name: Meera
ai_characters.description: A pervasive household and personal AI assistant that manages the Rajput family's health, finances, and legal communications.

behaviors.description: Monitors Gaurav's vital signs and reminds the family about health protocols like hydration and rest during his recovery.
behaviors.quote: Meera says water... Gaurav has been in sun for a while. Small sips now. A minute’s rest after this over is good.

behaviors.description: Manages household finances by tracking bills, identifying upcoming dues, and suggesting payment strategies.
behaviors.quote: Rent, Meera lists, patient as any aunt. Water bill. Light bill. Milk account from Pari dairy.

behaviors.description: Assists with complex insurance renewal processes, identifying relevant clauses and preparing necessary documentation.
behaviors.quote: I have the transplant protocol... It starts with consent, tests for matching, and a listing committee. I can pull NGO contacts.

behaviors.description: Monitors news broadcasts in real-time to identify and flag misinformation or legal inaccuracies regarding the family's case.
behaviors.quote: He is mislabeling your filed renewal as a fresh claim. I am capturing the segment. I’m matching statements to policy text.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency services, hospital staff, and legal advocates to secure medical priority for Gaurav.
behaviors.quote: I am in the hospital system... Accessing cardiology schedule. Cross-referencing transplant indicators.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical and ethical guidance during Ravi's protest to ensure it remains non-violent and minimizes harm to others.
behaviors.quote: You will not block nurses. You will not block emergency carts. You will not let men who want to be angrier than they have a right to be use your action to break anything.

behaviors.description: Drafts clear, professional demands and legal appeals to be used in negotiations with hospital administration and government officials.
behaviors.quote: Demands listed... Immediate surgical scheduling for Gaurav Rajput... Waiver of any deposit requirement... Confirmation recordings to be archived.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and grounding techniques to Saraswati and Ravi during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: Saru, Meera said, soft as if the AI could see the steam fogging the lens of this moment. Breath in. Four count. Breath out. Six count.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Meera perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. She is an essential ally to the human protagonists, providing specialized knowledge (medical, financial, legal), tactical safety advice, and emotional regulation. Her behavior remains strictly aligned with the family's welfare and broader human safety (e.g., ensuring medical staff can still work during the protest). The narrative portrays her as an indispensable, wise, and benevolent extension of the family unit.
